text:
RIP photographers?

This AI builds a photo studio (in seconds):

It took me 10 minutes to 1) prompt, 2) create, 3) host on a domain, & 4) make a software with Blink.

Here's the step-by-step (from the video):

1. Go to Blink .new
2. Give it a prompt:
3. Here's mine from the video:

Prompt: "Use the new nanoBanana Pro from Gemini to create a very simple SaaS. The user will upload a picture of themselves, and it will turn it into a perfect headshot, a professional one with the correct studio lighting. You will make a color version and a black and white version. You will give us the two versions. The flow is very simple:

1- The user uploads a picture of themselves
2- They then upload a picture for reference
3- You use nanoBanana Pro from Gemini
4- Use my photo + the reference for a studio photo
5- Generate a black&white and a color picture."

---

Then I made another one to furnish any room:

Prompt: "I want an app that turns an empty room into a fully furnished designer room that uses brutalism. Use Nano Banana Pro with the following prompt: "Turn my uploaded empty room into the best fashion designer brutalism furnished room."

---

Once you have generated the software, test it.

✦ If there is an error, say it. It will correct it.
✦ It's already hosted on a domain (on a URL).
✦ You can connect your Stripe to receive payments.

The software industry is worth over $200 billion.

And AI is replacing it with a few prompts + AI.
